thread.title: WestJet plane makes emergency landing in Calgary after smoke issues for second time
thread.title_full: WestJet plane makes emergency landing in Calgary after smoke issues for second time

author: Erika Tucker
title: WestJet plane makes emergency landing in Calgary after smoke issues for second time
text:
February 3, 2017 3:53 pm WestJet plane makes emergency landing in Calgary after smoke issues for second time By Erika Tucker Online Supervisor Global News 
WestJet has experienced two emergency landings in as many days in Calgary. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Darryl Dyck What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - WestJet flight to Hawaii forced to return to Calgary due to flat tire: passengers 
A WestJet spokesperson said flight 662 set to depart from Calgary to Toronto experienced a maintenance issue Friday morning, which caused the air conditioning system to emit smoke into the aircraft. 
“The smoke quickly dissipated however out of an abundance of caution the crew declared an emergency and returned to Calgary,” Lauren Stewart said in an email to Global News. 
She said the flight landed normally at around 10:40 a.m. 
After Thursday’s incident involving smoke in the aircraft , the plane was removed from service and maintenance was conducted overnight. 
“The aircraft will again be removed and additional maintenance inspections conducted before a return to service,” Stewart said. 
WestJet expected all passengers would be re-accommodated to Toronto later on Friday. 
“It is important to remember that just because an emergency is declared does not necessarily mean there is an emergency on board,” she wrote. 
“The declaration is made to ensure priority landing and the presence of emergency vehicles, if required.”   Inc.
